data.name: VTuber Beats
data.detailed_description:
❤ COMING SOON ❤ YOKAI ART

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1812060


About the Game

Overview

You will control a singer to run along with the concert platform and attack many obstacles to finishing the performance perfectly.

Feature

  • Combine platforming game and rhythm music game.
  • Control character with 2 keys to attack the coming target.
  • Many songs with designated levels.

Story

An idol's life is hard, to perform on the stage, there are many temptations. Alice has to try her best to overcome all the obstacles to reach the final performance stage.

Control

- Press key J to hit the ground obstacle and press F key to hit the air obstacle when it reaching the marker in front of the character.
- Hold key to perform a long singing note.

data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Mature imagery. Users can unlock characters in the game where they are wearing revealing costumes and/or in suggestive poses and voices.
